meanings.sent1: The unimportances of the small pebbles on the path were easily overlooked.
meanings.sent2: She realized the unimportances of the daily chores when compared to spending time with loved ones.
meanings.sent3: The unimportances of the mismatched socks led to a funny mix-up at the laundry.
meanings.sent4: In the grand scheme of life, the unimportances of material possessions became clear.
meanings.sent5: The teacher emphasized the unimportances of spelling errors to focus on the content of the essay.

meanings.definition: Things or matters of little consequence.
meanings.sent1: He spent his time worrying about the unimportances of minor details instead of the big picture.
meanings.sent2: The unimportances of the color of the pen used to sign the document seemed trivial in the end.
meanings.sent3: The unimportances of the missing puzzle piece made the completed picture even more intriguing.
meanings.sent4: She swept away the unimportances of negative thoughts to make room for positivity.
meanings.sent5: The artist focused on capturing the unimportances of everyday objects in a series of paintings.
